results.title: The 1956 Olympic story [Winter Olympics in Cortina, Italy]
results.creator_credit: Norman Mackay, Harry Leaman and Helms Athletic Foundation

video_links.name: The 1956 Olympic story [Winter Olympics in Cortina, Italy]

results.brief_description: Documentary film on the Olympic Winter Games in Cortina in the Italian Alps, 1956. Sets the panoramic views of Cortina and the venues where the 1956 Winter games will be held whilst highlighting the previous 1952 Oslo Winter games with footage of specific events. Also includes footage of Melbourne in 1956 featuring the Melbourne Cricket Ground and St Kilda Town Hall and images of the 1952 Summer games in Helsinki. Narrated by Fred Hessler.

results.title: Nikko: autumn in Japan's alpine playground
results.brief_description: Describes and illustrates autumn in Nikko, Japan’s alpine playground. Shows various outdoor activities on Lake Chunzenji.

results.title: Leaf
results.brief_description: Captures the spirit of Autumn in the wilderness, by blending the elements of wind and leaf in a visually and rhythmically enchanting study of California’s Yosemite valley.

results.title: Autumn: a concept film
results.brief_description: A short experimental film which focuses on one tree as it loses its leaves during the autumn season. We watch until finally the last leaf falls and the tree is completely bare. Without commentary but accompanied with music. No other credits available.

results.title: Train control
results.brief_description: Shows how the movements of trains on the New South Wales railway system are controlled to ensure smooth running and prevent accidents. When the system has been explained, its working is illustrated by tracing the journey of a goods train from one point to another.

results.title: Professional Icing at Home
results.brief_description: Jean Bowring demonstrates how to decorate a birthday cake using simple equipment and techniques. A fruit cake is first covered with fondant icing and then decorated using an icing bag and assortment of tubes. The film concludes with examples of more elaborate work in which the same simple techniques of decoration have been used.

results.title: Gel
results.creator_credit: Ralph Henderson, Eric White and Films Sagittaire
results.brief_description: Produced for the Davis Gelatine company, the film uses a domestic science student to outline some of the properties and uses of gelatine. Various examples of modern gelatine cookery are also shown.

results.title: Make the Most of Your Roast
results.creator_credit: Meat and Livestock Australia and Robert Knapp
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Meat makes the meal”.
Produced for the Australian Meat Board, this film demonstrates clearly and simply the steps essential in making a good roast. Tips such as keeping the oven temperature low, placing the meat on a grill and using a meat thermometer are explained and demonstrated.

results.title: Waistlines and lifelines
results.creator_credit: Russell Gibbs, John Banks and Advent Films
results.brief_description: Ron has a weight problem. He tries massage and the crash diet, but to no avail. A heart attack scare sends him to his doctor, who recommends graded exercises and consultation with a dietician.
